Package aom.scripting.xs.kb

Class Path

Object
Path
public class Path
extends Object
This class provides a collection of KB commands concerning Paths and Attack Routes. Paths are used by the AI to find its way throughout the map, launch attacks etc...
Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

    • kbCanSimPath

      public bool kbCanSimPath​(vector pointA, vector pointB, long protoUnitTypeID, float range)
      Returns true if the given unit type can path from pointA to pointB.

      Requires a proper context player.

      The parameter range doesn't seem to do anything any can be omitted.

    • kbCanPath2

      public bool kbCanPath2​(vector pointA, vector pointB, long protoUnitTypeID, float range)
      Returns true if the given unit type can path from pointA to pointB.

      Requires a proper context player.

      Unlike kbCanSimPath, this function crashes the game if the range parameter is too low.

    • kbCreateAttackRoute

      public int kbCreateAttackRoute​(string name, int startAreaID, int goalAreaID, int numInitialRoutes)
